name: Enemies always make big speeches
description:
Entry for Ludum Dare 51
Use well the last seconds this enemy gives you. You will need it. A shooter & decision making game.

You will prepare & upgrade your gears while the boss is occupied to gather energy & make speeches. Then shoot & dodge

Controls :
You will need a keyboard & mouse for the menus, but then you can use your controller during the fight.

    Keyboard & mouse :
    LMB = Shoot
    RMB = Second ability
    WASD = move

    Controller :
    RT (R2) = Shoot
    LT (L2) = Second ability
    Left stick = move
